key_risks: Data Privacy and Security: Handling sensitive genomic data requires stringent compliance with global data protection regulations.
Regulatory Compliance: Operating in a highly regulated industry with diverse healthcare standards across jurisdictions.
Market Competition: Intense competition in the genomics and AI-driven healthcare sectors.
Financial Performance: Scrutiny over consistent financial performance and path to profitability as a new public company.
controversies: Data Privacy and Security: Potential legal repercussions and loss of trust if data privacy measures fail.
Regulatory Compliance: Possible delays in product approvals or market access due to regulatory hurdles.
social_issues: Data Privacy: Ensuring the ethical handling of sensitive genomic data to protect patient privacy.
governance_issues: Regulatory Compliance: Adherence to diverse healthcare standards and regulations across multiple jurisdictions.
